name: Viveport Video
detailed_description: Viveport Video is a VR video player providing immersive and cinematic VR experience of 3D, 180 and 360 video. Its intuitive control system works best with PC VR headsets, including VIVE and Oculus Rift. In addition, it also offers great collections of premium video libraries, including Red bull and MLB.
